name: WP Attach
author: Gabriel Chi Hong Lee

sections.description: WP Attach allows you to attach files to posts or pages as an information box by using the shortcode [wpattach link=”LINK_TO_YOUR_FILE”]. Filetypes supported includes: .jpg .png .mp3 .mp4 .pdf .ae .ai .avi .css .doc .docx .docs .dw .eps .fl .fla .fw .html .id .ps .psd .ppt .pptx .xls .xlsx .slides .sheets
sections.installation:
1. Upload wpattach.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. All done! ðŸ™‚
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload wpattach.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. All done! ðŸ™‚

How to use the plugin?

Just add the following code to your post or page: [wpattach link=”LINK_TO_YOUR_FILE”]

I need additional help!

No problem, just contact me (Gabriel Chi Hong Lee) and I’ll see what I can do for you. You can find me here:
WordPress
GitHub
StackOverflow
Email: chihonglee777@gmail.com

short_description: WP Attach allows you to attach files to posts or pages as an information box by using simple shortcodes.
